Key.English: You are considered teamkiller and not allowed in BLUFOR or OPFOR teams. You will shortly be kicked back to the lobby where you can only join Independent and killing anyone is allowed.
You have played as %1 for too long and can not switch to the other team. You can still play as Independent
Please enter driver seat before refueling

You are in %3 team.

TEAMKILLING IS FORBIDDEN UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES AND WILL BE PUNISHED!
If you play in this team for more than 3 minutes, you will not be able to change it later.

You are in %3 team.
You are FREE TO ATTACK ANYONE, including other %4 players.

Visit www.clanvalhalla.com.au/forums for info, rules and changes.

This Server is funded by donations. Show your support donate at www.clanvalhalla.com.au
Server Daily Restart Time: 10AM, 6PM, 2AM (EST).

Hotkeys:
Tilde key to open Player Menu

Team killing is against the rules!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and say sorry, otherwise they will mark you as teamkiller and you will get kicked.

1. Keep bad language to a minimum. No foul language or racist comments against other playersis allowed. If you have a problm with another player, try to resolve it on direct channel chat or in an extreme case contact an admin.
2. Do not use Global Chat to speak with one person or your team. At least use Side Channel or get into our public Teamspeak 3 Server 27.50.71.250:10162.
3. Team killing team mates when you BLUFOR or OPFOR is forbidden and punishable. Play as Independent if you want to be free for all.
4. Revealing information about your (ex)team to other teams is strictly forbidden
5. Do not exploit R3F or any other addons or you will be banned.
6. Using or spamming with loud\long custom sound commands will cause punishment up to permaban.
7. Hacking is FORBIDDEN and you will be caught. we check the logs daily and run scripts to detect you, punishable with permaban.
Enemy player just entered the area
Placing explosives within 200m of a gun store is forbidden.
You have been kicked for a reserved slot

You have been team-killed by %2 player %1.

If this was an accident then forgive them, otherwise they should explain their actions.

If the player does not explain why then select Punish or Announce.
Please select where you would like to spawn. In order to spawn in specific town it should have at least 1 friendly player in it and no enemy players.
Please select where you would like to spawn. Independents can only spawn in random town
Please select where you would like to spawn. Since you are free for all, you can either spawn in random town or north-west, north-east, south-east, south-west or center town.
Random village or town around the map.
YOU ARE ALREADY PERFORMING ANOTHER ACTION!
YOU ALREADY HAVE AN ACTIVE SPAWN BEACON!
YOU CANNOT ENTER A VEHICLE WHILE PLACING A SPAWN BEACON!
YOU ARE ALREADY HAVE TOO MANY OF THAT OBJECT!
